Zelenović: Članovi REM-a moraju biti smenjeni

03 Nov 2019, 08:35

Predsednik Zajedno za Srbiju i gradonačelnik Šapca Nebojša Zelenović izjavio je danas da svi članovi REM-a moraju biti smenjeni i da moraju biti oduzete licence za rad svim televizijama koje su kršeći zakon postale instrument brutalne propagande režima.Zelenović je za agenciju Beta rekao da ti mediji emituju lažne vesti, sprečavaju iznošenje različitih mišljenja i ne pružaju gradjanima informacije koje štite javni interes."RTS i sve  televizije sa nacionalnim frekvencijama sistematski zataškavaju afere o korupciji samog vrha države, štite funkcionere umesto da štite javni interes, a šef države po sopstvenom izboru dobija udarne televizijske termine da bi se obračunavao sa opozicijom i svima koji drugačije misle, bez mogućnosti da se čuje druga strana i drugačije mišljenje", rekao je Zelenović.Zelenović je dodao da je u skladu sa zakonskom obavezom RTS-a po kojoj je javni servis dužan da objektivno i istinito informiše gradjane, javno apelovao na direktora RTS Dragana Bujoševića da organizuje debatnu emisiju u kojoj bi se suočio sa gradonačelnikom Beograda Zoranom Radojićićem."Zakonska obaveza RTS, kao i ostalih emitera je da precizno izveste gradjane zbog čega se ponovo radi rekonstrukcija rekonstruisanog trga u Beogradu, i da konačno utvrdimo da li radovi zaista koštaju 6,5 miliona evra kako je navedeno u Ugovoru potpisanom 2018. godine", rekao je Zelenović.Kako je dodao, s obzirom da je zbog nesposobnosti vlasti projekat više puta menjan, da se kolovoz raspao 10 dana od svečanog otvaranja, treba da se utvrdi da li su tačne indicije na koje ukazuju eksperti da su radovi koštali ukupno 12 miliona evra."Da utvrdimo precizno da li je to 13 ili 25 puta skuplje od rekonstrukcije trga u Šapcu koji je po površini veći", istakao je Zelenović i konstatovao da je pitanje potrošnje novca iz budžeta javni interes i da je otvaranje takvih pitanja osnovna zakonska obaveza medija.Prema njegovim rečima, REM koji plaćaju gradjani Srbije, ne reaguje na to što RTS i ostali korisnici nacionalne frekvencije svakodnevno krše zakon, a svojim nečinjenjem takodje krši zakone i "brižljivo gaji medijski mrak" koji je, kako je dodao "jedina karta Aleksandru Vučiću za ostanak na vlasti"."Dok se televizije sa nacionalnom frekvencijom doslovno utrkuju u širenju dezinformacija, panike, govora mržnje, u javnom blaćenju i sramoćenju svakog u koga Vučić upre prstom, RTS se vrlo predano brine da svaki minut programa odobri Aleksandar Vučić i da ide njemu u korist i da se slučajno ne vidi bilo sta što bi uzdrmalo njegov ostanak na vlasti. A vlast bi uzdrmalo samo poštovanje zakona i istinito informisanje", naglasio je Zelenović.Zelenović je ocenio da televizijski prenos slave Srpske napredne stranke u trajanju od nekoliko sati na privatnoj televiziji je za članove REM-a informativni program, iako je svima jasno da je to besprizorno kršenje zakona."Debata na RTS na koju sam pozvao se naravno neće dogoditi. Otvaranje ovog pitanja uporedne analize rekonstrukcije dva trga se naravno neće dogoditi. Članovi REM-a će naravno ćutati na svakodnevno kršenjezakona koje čine instrumentalizovani mediji, iako ih gradjani plaćaju da medije prate, opominju i sankcionišu, čak i oduzimanjem  frekvencije", upozorio je Zelenović.Zelenović je zaključio da je "pitanje smene članova REM-a pitanje minimuma normalnosti našeg društva".

Zelenovic: REM members must be replaced

03 Nov 2019, 08:35

Together for Serbia and Sabac Mayor Nebojsa Zelenovic said today that all REM members must be sacked and licenses must be revoked for all televisions that violate the regime's brutal propaganda regime. Zelenovic told Beta news agency broadcasting fake news, preventing differing opinions and not providing citizens with information that protects the public interest. "RTS and all nationally televised broadcasts systematically cover up corruption cases at the very top of the state, protect functionaries instead of protecting the public interest, and the head of state of his choice gets striking television terms to deal with the opposition and anyone who thinks differently, without being able to hear the other party and a different opinion, "Zelenovic said. Zelenovic added that he was in compliance with the RTS legal obligation under which public service is required to inform the citizens objectively and truthfully, he publicly appealed directly RTS broadcaster Dragan Bujošević to organize a debate show in which he would confront Belgrade Mayor Zoran Radojic. "It is the legal obligation of RTS, as well as other broadcasters, to accurately inform the citizens why the reconstructed Belgrade square is being reconstructed and to finally determine whether the works really cost € 6.5 million as stated in the contract signed in 2018, "Zelenovic said. As he added, given that the authorities were unable to change the project several times, that August had fallen apart 10 days since the opening ceremony, to ascertain whether the indications indicated by experts are that the works cost a total of € 12 million. "To determine precisely whether it is 13 or 25 times more expensive than reconstruction of the square in Sabac, which is larger in area," Zelenovic said. noted that the issue of spending money from the budget is a public interest and that the opening of such issues is a basic legal obligation of the media. Serbia, too, does not respond to the fact that RTS and other national frequency users violate the law on a daily basis, and by their failure to do so also violate the laws and "carefully cultivate media darkness", which, he added, is "the only ticket to Aleksandar Vucic to stay in power." national television stations are literally racing in the spread of misinformation, panic, hate speech, in public blaming and shaming of anyone who gets his finger on Vucic, RTS is very committed to approving every minute of the program to Aleksandar Vucic and favoring it and accidentally doesn't see anything that would shake his stay in power. And the government would shake only the observance of the law and true information, "Zelenovic emphasized. Zelenovic said that television broadcasting by the Serbian Progressive Party for several hours on private television is an informative program for REM members, although it is clear to everyone that unprecedented violation of the law. "The debate on the RTS that I called for will of course not happen. The opening of this question of comparative analysis of the reconstruction of the two squares will of course not happen. REM members will, of course, remain silent on the day-to-day violation of the instrumental media laws, even though citizens pay them to monitor, admonish and sanction the media, even by subtracting the frequency, "Zelenovic warned. Zelenovic concluded that" the issue of dismissing REM members is a matter the minimum normality of our society. "
